detail_desc: Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Double-layered hat in printed jersey with a reversible sequin motif.
Earrings with plastic beads and tassels. Length 8.5 cm.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with contrasting colour sections and buttons down the front.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Double-layered hairband in a chunky knit with a knot detail at the front.
Coat in a sturdy weave containing some wool with notch lapels. Concealed press-stud at the front, pockets in the side seams, an inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined.
Lined boots in imitation leather with a lightly padded, quilted shaft and zip in one side. Faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted soles.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and lapped shoulders. Frills in a broderie anglaise weave over the shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Short dress in woven fabric with tiered flounces in crinkled chiffon and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Gathers at the shoulders and a seam with ties at the waist. Lined.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.
One-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short V-neck blouse in a soft weave with buttons down the front, long sleeves and a tie at the hem.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neckline, button placket and short slits in the sides. The cotton content of the tops is organic.

Off-the-shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow shoulder straps and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and a decorative seam with glittery thread at the side.

Soft, non-wired push-up bra in ribbed microfibre with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hem and no fasteners. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, leggings and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Wide T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length treggings in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with a ribbed, easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fully lined bikini top with an elasticated hem.
A-line blouse in an airy cotton weave with short raglan sleeves and covered elastication with a small frill trim at the top.

Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fine-knit jumper with a wrapover-front hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes. Rib-knit sections at the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal blend with small metal studs around the neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shorts in soft slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, front and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacket with a soft pile lining, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Bolero in soft faux fur with cap sleeves and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Lined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and frills down the legs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, wrapover funnel collar, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in quilted imitation leather with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Fully-fashioned trainers in mesh with rubber details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Top in slub-weave jersey with a reversible-sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 1½-3Y) and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly longer at the back.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-4Y with a normal print).
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Vest top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Thin embossed metal rings in various sizes that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined drawstring hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Frilled blouse in plumeti chiffon with a small stand-up collar, partially concealed buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and gently rounded hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Vest top in a soft, ribbed viscose blend.
Bras in cotton jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a racer back and cut-out section at the back.
Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cap with glittery ears at the top, embroidered appliqués on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit pima cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, printed jersey with a round neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length, A-line skirt in woven fabric with box pleats front and back and a high waist with covered elastication at the back and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, concealed buttons at the top, and a decorative button band down the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Shorts in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with a collar and drawstring, and a zip at the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, press-stud on the shoulders, short puff sleeves and a gathered yoke.
Fully lined swimsuit with decorative appliqués at the top, narrow shoulder straps and a flounce at the hip.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with rounded toes, a zip in one side and covered block heels. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Cardigan in a bouclé knit made from a wool blend with a shawl collar, zip at one side and long sleeves.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill at the front and along the shoulder straps and a decorative bow at the back.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a detachable tie belt. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Suede mules with straps, open toes and covered wedge heels. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Fitted cardigan in a fine, fluffy knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
